languages.text: "Можно попытаться обойтись теми ресурсами, которые есть — разыскать беглых астропатов, которые натаскают подающих надежды психически активных обитателей протектората. Прискорбное нарушение законов Его, обусловленное нашей тяжелой ситуацией..."

"We could also try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — by seeking out fugitive Astropaths and having them train psychically-active citizens of the protectorate who show promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, but, considering our grave situation..."
languages.original_text: "Можно попытаться обойтись теми ресурсами, которые есть — разыскать беглых астропатов, которые натаскают подающих надежды психически активных обитателей протектората. Прискорбное нарушение законов Его, обусловленное нашей тяжелой ситуацией..."

traits.locale_text: "We can try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — seek out the unsanctioned astropaths who are coaching the promising psy-active citizens of the protectorate. A most regrettable violation of His laws, caused by our grave situation..."

"We can try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — seek out the unsanctioned astropaths who are coaching the promising psy-active citizens of the protectorate. A most regrettable violation of His laws, caused by our grave situation..."

"We could also try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — by seeking out fugitive Astropaths and having them train psychically-active citizens of the protectorate who show promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, but, considering our grave situation..."

"We can try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — seek out the unsanctioned Astropaths who train those psy-active citizens of the protectorate displaying promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, caused by our grave situation..."

"We can try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — seek out the unsanctioned Astropaths who train those psy-active citizens of the protectorate displaying promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, caused by our grave situation..."

"We could also try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — by seeking out fugitive Astropaths and having them train psychically-active citizens of the protectorate who show promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, but, considering our grave situation..."

"We could also try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — by seeking out fugitive Astropaths and having them train psychically-active citizens of the protectorate who show promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, but, considering our grave situation..."

"We could also try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — by seeking out fugitive Astropaths and having them train psychically-active citizens of the protectorate who show promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, but, considering our grave situation..."

languages.text: “我们也可以试着用现有的资源凑合，寻找一部分没有经过帝国授权的星语者。他们可以负责训练属地内那些拥有灵能潜力的公民。令人遗憾的是，这样的做法违背了帝皇的律法，但考虑到当下严峻的情势……”
languages.original_text: "We could also try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — by seeking out fugitive Astropaths and having them train psychically-active citizens of the protectorate who show promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, but, considering our grave situation..."

traits.locale_text: “我们也可以试着用现有的资源凑合，寻找一部分没有经过帝国授权的星语者。他们可以负责训练属地内那些拥有灵能潜力的公民。令人遗憾的是，这样的做法违背了帝皇的律法，但考虑到当下严峻的情势……”
“我们可以试着用现有的资源凑合，寻找一部分没有经过帝国授权的星语者。他们可以负责训练属地内那些拥有灵能潜力的公民。令人遗憾的是，这样的做法违背了帝皇的律法，但我们受严峻情势所迫，别无选择……”

languages.text: «Podemos intentar arreglárnoslas con los recursos que ya tenemos a nuestra disposición: buscar Astrópatas fugitivos para que entrenen a ciudadanos psicoactivos del protectorado que parezcan prometedores. Es una violación lamentable de Sus leyes, pero, dada la gravedad de nuestra situación...».
languages.original_text: "We could also try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — by seeking out fugitive Astropaths and having them train psychically-active citizens of the protectorate who show promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, but, considering our grave situation..."

traits.locale_text: «Podemos intentar arreglárnoslas con los recursos que ya tenemos a nuestra disposición: buscar Astrópatas fugitivos para que entrenen a ciudadanos psicoactivos del protectorado que parezcan prometedores. Es una violación lamentable de Sus leyes, pero, dada la gravedad de nuestra situación...».

languages.text: 「すでに利用可能な資源で何とかすることができる...有望な保護国家の超能力を使える民を訓練している、非公認の感応通信官を探すんだ。残念だが、法律違反は我々の深刻な状況が原因で生じたのだ...」
languages.original_text: "We could also try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — by seeking out fugitive Astropaths and having them train psychically-active citizens of the protectorate who show promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, but, considering our grave situation..."

traits.locale_text: 「すでに利用可能な資源で何とかすることができる...有望な保護国家の超能力を使える民を訓練している、非公認の感応通信官を探すんだ。残念だが、法律違反は我々の深刻な状況が原因で生じたのだ...」
「すでに利用可能な資源で何とかすることができる...有望な保護国家の超能力を使える民を訓練している、非公認の感応通信官を探すんだ。残念だが、法律違反は我々の深刻な状況が原因で生じたのだ...」

languages.text: « Nous pourrions aussi tenter de nous en sortir avec les ressources dont nous disposons... en cherchant des astropathes en fuite afin qu'ils forment les citoyens prometteurs dans le protectorat. C'est une transgression tout à fait regrettable de Sa loi, mais la situation l'exige... »
languages.original_text: "We could also try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — by seeking out fugitive Astropaths and having them train psychically-active citizens of the protectorate who show promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, but, considering our grave situation..."

traits.locale_text: « Nous pourrions aussi tenter de nous en sortir avec les ressources dont nous disposons... en cherchant des astropathes en fuite afin qu'ils forment les citoyens prometteurs dans le protectorat. C'est une transgression tout à fait regrettable de Sa loi, mais la situation l'exige... »

languages.text: "Wir können auch versuchen, mit den bereits verfügbaren Ressourcen auszukommen ... indem wir flüchtige Astropathen aufspüren, um mit ihrer Hilfe viel versprechende psionisch aktive Bürger des Protektorats auszubilden. Ein bedauerlicher Verstoß gegen Seine Gesetze, aber bedenkt man unsere missliche Lage ..."
languages.original_text: "We could also try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — by seeking out fugitive Astropaths and having them train psychically-active citizens of the protectorate who show promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, but, considering our grave situation..."

traits.locale_text: "Wir können auch versuchen, mit den bereits verfügbaren Ressourcen auszukommen ... indem wir flüchtige Astropathen aufspüren, um mit ihrer Hilfe viel versprechende psionisch aktive Bürger des Protektorats auszubilden. Ein bedauerlicher Verstoß gegen Seine Gesetze, aber bedenkt man unsere missliche Lage ..."

"Wir können versuchen, mit den bereits verfügbaren Ressourcen auszukommen — die unsanktionierten Astropathen finden, die psi-aktive Bürger des Protektorats ausbilden. Ein bedauernswerter Verstoß gegen seine Gesetze, durch unsere betrübliche Lage ausgelöst ..."

languages.text: "Hâlihazırda elimizin altındaki kaynaklarla idare etmeyi deneyebiliriz. Kaçak Astropatları arayıp bulmalı ve protektoranın ümit vadeden, aktif ruhsezi sahibi yurttaşlarını eğittirebiliriz. O'nun kanunlarını acınası bir şekilde ihlal etmiş oluruz ancak biçare durumumuz düşünülünce..."
languages.original_text: "We could also try getting by with the resources that are already available to us — by seeking out fugitive Astropaths and having them train psychically-active citizens of the protectorate who show promise. A most regrettable violation of His laws, but, considering our grave situation..."

traits.locale_text: "Hâlihazırda elimizin altındaki kaynaklarla idare etmeyi deneyebiliriz. Kaçak Astropatları arayıp bulmalı ve protektoranın ümit vadeden, aktif ruhsezi sahibi yurttaşlarını eğittirebiliriz. O'nun kanunlarını acınası bir şekilde ihlal etmiş oluruz ancak biçare durumumuz düşünülünce..."
